comment.author: gauthier
comment.text:
That look great:
I've worked around this too many time by adding relaying properties with [BelongsTo(Update=false, Insert=false)] with specific implementation that set the key inner properties.
Also, a test case illustrating the usage and proving actual working would be great.
Thanks!

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: This is an interesting patch, but it cannot be applied without a proper testcase.

comment.author: Maethorin
comment.text:
Its possible to get a version (some branch) with this patch applied? Or how can I apply this patch im my local version? I want to produce the testcases.

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: Download the most recent version of the patch and drag it with right mouse button pressed onto the ActiveRecord folder in your trunk. Select "Apply patch here". (This requires TortoiseSVN).

comment.author: Maethorin
comment.text: I download the NH2.0 version in the branches... I pretend to use the NH2... Do you recomend using the trunk? (problems like conflicts in merging)

comment.author: mzywitza
comment.text: Marcio, I added a patch that applies painlessly to current trunk (5719). And yes, I recommend changing to trunk in any case. Both AR and NH are by now reasonably close to release. To include the patch, I need at least one test in C.AR.T.Internal testing the XML generation and one test case with a simple model showing how it is used. Thanks for your efforts.
